attributes.action: Repair the Burgh Road Carlisle Cumbria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This road is dangerous,I would defy any person from the government to come and inspect this road and say it is ok.I am a local business (caravan park) with over 1000 residents.Every customer has complained about the lack of repairs to this road from Burgh By Sands to Port Carlisle.When some one gets killed or injured on this road i would like to make sure i have done as much as i can to prevent this. I hope the right people are made accountable if a tragedy happens.Can the road be repaired or renewed to the required standard. Cumbria Highways are doing no repairs making this road unsafe.I have been fobbed off for the last 24 months.
